full_description:
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Join Avis Budget Group as a Business Insights Analyst and help drive smarter decisions through data. In this role, you'll engage with business teams to understand challenges, provide thought leadership, and identify how advanced analytics solutions could be leveraged.
\n
\n
\n
\n
What You'll Do:
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Draw conclusions and make actionable recommendations based on analysis
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Help better leverage, utilize, and instill advanced analytics solutions throughout the organization
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Design and develop advanced analytics solutions
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Ensure that advanced analytics solutions are practical and effective based on expertise and experience
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Develop processes and tools to measure and monitor solution performance and value achievement
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Continually improve existing advanced analytics solutions
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Perks
You’ll
Get:
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Paid time off
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
401K retirement plan with company matched contributions
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Access to Medical, Dental, Vision, Life and Disability insurance
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Eligible to elect other voluntary benefits including: Group Legal, Identity Theft, Insurance, FSA, additional life insurance coverages
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Contribute up to $260 as a tax free benefit for public transportation or parking expenses
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Employee discounts, including discounted prices on purchase of Avis / Budget cars
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Access to an Employee Assistance Program for services including counseling, financial and legal consultation, referrals for care service, and more
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
What We're Looking For:
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Master's degree in Business Analytics, Data Engineering, Data Science, Econometrics or related field
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
1-2 years’ experience delivering advanced analytics solutions or equivalent combination of education and relevant internship experience in data analytic type roles.
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Experience with database queries (e.g., Oracle, SQLServer, Access, Hadoop/HiveSQL), and at least one programming language (e.g. Python or R)
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Knowledge of BI tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI)
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Ability to think strategically and identify critical success factors when developing solutions
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Strong communication, organization, and time management skills
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Ability to work effectively in a team oriented, high demand, and fast paced environment
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
The annual starting salary for this position is between $57,600 – $98,548 annually. Factors that may affect starting pay within this range include geography/market, skills, education, experience, and other qualifications of the successful candidate.
\n
\n
\n
\n
Who We Are:
\n
\n
\n
\n
Here at Avis Budget Group, you will be joining a team of 25,000 driven people, performing with purpose. Together, we’re moving the future of transportation forward with our innovative, customer-focused solutions.
\n
\n
\n
\n
Our culture is performance driven, where we encourage and support each other to be at our best through leadership, training, tools, and rewards.
\n
\n
\n
\n
We are proud to make a positive difference to the lives of our colleagues, customers, and communities where we operate.
\n
\n
\n
\n
Avis Budget Group is an Equal Opportunity Employer – Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, status as a protected veteran or any other category protected by applicable law.
\n
\n
\n
\n
This advertisement
does not constitute
a promise or guarantee of employment. This advertisement describes the general nature and level of this position only. Essential functions and responsibilities may change as business needs require. The compensation and benefits information
is
accurate
as of the date of this posting. The Company reserves the right to
modify
this information at any time, with or without notice, subject to applicable law. This position may be with any affiliate of Avis Budget Group.
\n
\n
\n
\n
Parsippany\n
New Jersey\n
United States of America\n
